page.title: 10RECREATION GAMES PART ONE
page.content: {4 SQUARE.}This game needs four people for the start. Any more children make a queue. The person in fourth square throws the ball to second and she throws to any square she likes. If the ball bounces twice in your square you are out and go to the back of the queue. The first person in the queue goes into first square and the rest move on if they can.If they cant they stay in that square. {ICE CUBES. }This is a game for over two people and someone is on it and some other people hide and the person on it has to find them. The person who is hiding tries to get in and say ice cubes.If they find the person who is hiding, the person who is on it says freeze whatever their name is and they are all caught. The one who was caught first is on it again.
